website_summaries.verdict: A compact, quiet desk fan that is ideal for studying or working. Powered via USB and small enough for travel.
pros: Strong airflow with three speeds and 40 degrees of pivoting capability
Clock face style is narrower than other models, so you have plenty of desk space behind it
USB cable is almost five ft. long to accommodate fan placement near or far
cons: Vibrates and moves across desk while fan blades spin

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan...
customer_reviews.text: My old USB desk fan was starting to get noisy on me, but, for under $10, I wasn't expecting more than a year's use out of it. I'm so happy I picked this as the replacement. Unlike my old fan, this has three different speeds. Low is more than powerful enough for 95% of my need. The medium speed will work well on a hot day, and the high setting is strong enough to look like Fabio on the cover of a bodice ripper. So far, it's a five-star experience.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: WHOA
customer_reviews.text: This itty bitty fan is CRAZY strong! (in a good way) it's the perfect size for my work desk and is so quiet and powerful. I would highly recommend this fan for anyone, like me, who needs a cool breeze all year long
customer_reviews.author: Lauren ORourke

customer_reviews.title: If you need anything stronger, then buy a AC unit.
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away how powerful this little fan is. It's a perfect size for my office at work. On the low setting, you can literally feel the breeze 6ft away. I really dont think I'll ever need the high setting. If you need anything other than the high setting for your desk area.. then you might need a window AC unit. Lol. Small minor fix, would be to add a clip option.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value in such a small light package.
customer_reviews.text: Although I read the other reviews on this, I wasn't expecting to be blown away (pun intended) by the strength on this fan. I had a little 4 inch usb fan by my desk that was making a lot of noise and needed replaced. I never expected a fan was was powered simply by usb to be be as powerful and this one is. Even the low setting is sufficient to keep me cool and the highest setting is almost overkill but still acceptably quiet. This is pretty much a no-brainer at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Estes

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fan and for the price, it's a steal. Love that it has three speeds. The low speed is plenty to cool me down quick. I've not had a use for the higher speeds, maybe this summer but the low speed it awesome. It tilts up and down very easily. It is small enough and doesn't take up much space at all on my desk. Just love it. Thinking about buying a couple more for my family, we all use fans at night and honestly this one would be perfect on a night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: More for brief use in a tough spot and disposable. Won't run long.
customer_reviews.text: This fan only ran for about 4 hours before the motor burned out. I used Amazon reward dollars to purchase this fan and now they are wasted. The construction seemed okay and was quite with three level settings. It's actually about a $5 fan and didn't perform as advertised for long at all. When it worked it worked well, but I don't think they are built to last long. Consider this fan if you need a temporary, disposable fan to get you through a brief tough spot. If designed to work with regular use it would not be a bad fan. It's more for brief use and disposable. Most parts are recyclable. It's a shame because it's a stylish fan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pieper

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when my fan arrived. That excitement faded quickly when I plugged it in and it ran for about 15 seconds then it just stopped. I hadn't turned it off and wasn't touching it. Tried 3 more times and the same thing happened each time. That was when Yoda said, "Try to work right it did not!" So I was disappointed but knew I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Jen

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was great....for 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked GREAT....for 3 days now it sounds like the fan blade is hitting the plastic blade cover. I checked to see if there was a way to tighten the blade...not that I can see. It is a catch 22 now because is it worth the trouble to try to send it back? At the price I won't. Either I got a bad one or these things arent worth the time ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm dissatisfied. I wasn't expecting this thing to last forever, but 3 months is not adequate either. If I'm lucky, it works for about 10 minutes before shutting off. At least I got this on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love this mini fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work cubicle as it would replace my old fan that has fallen apart (see pic). When I unboxed it I thought "Wow, how cute. A little bitty fan." I plugged it in to the USB wall socket and was like, "Where's the power button?" It's on the back and there is a tiny little LED light under it when powered on. Ahhhhhh! Thinking of buying another for the heck of it, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Well to begin, it showed up and the front portion was broken. I figured, not a big deal because the fan itself worked and it was just cosmetic, so I moved on. Today, my watch got caught on the wire and I knocked the fan over. Literally just tipped over, and now the entire fan rattles so loud it's completely unusable. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: econner

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after a handful of uses, and this is the second OPOLAR fan that’s randomly stopped working. The last one I purchased last summer lasted roughly 2 months. I won’t be purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Very Well Designed Fan
customer_reviews.text: My room at work is horribly hot in summer. I purchased this little guy so that when I have the chance to sit at the desk I can cool off. I am so happy with this USB fan. His USB cord is nice and long. He has three distinct speeds. And he is so well balanced that I can sit him on a mini speaker and he won’t vibrate himself into danger. He stays right where I put him. Honestly? This little guy is a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: CLMCM

customer_reviews.title: Broke with only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Amazon forces you to give a star but i would have left no stars. Only used it a few times barely even for an hour and now it doesn't turn on again. I tried ever USB port and nothing. When it did work it was great but not worth it if you can only get 1 use out of it. So annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna_r

customer_reviews.title: Not working on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today, and it won’t even turn on. I tried it in several USB ports to be sure. It came in a big box with other items, so now I have to find a small box to return it. I’m sure the return will be easy, it’s just a hassle to have to find a small box.
customer_reviews.author: 1FLHippy

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of the fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought one fan. I loved it so much. I took it work, used it in the living room, and even took it to bed with me. It helped me stay focused at work, cool while relaxing after work, and it helped me breath while I slept, which made me sleep more soundly. I can even use it in the car while driving in addition to air conditioning. The noise level is perfect - it's so soothing. I named my fan William. So, naturally, I expanded his family. His wife's name is Tabitha and their son is James. I love my three fans so much. Anyway. You will not be sorry if you buy these fans.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was purchased for my new home office, which gets extremely hot in the summer due to being on our 2nd level. I had my doubts that this tiny little fan would do the trick, but was looking for something quiet so as not to be heard by clients while on calls/video meetings. Nobody hears anything and even on low this fan makes me cold!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Heath

customer_reviews.title: My little savior...
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is perfect at work. I run warm normally but also I have these anxiety related hot flashes, and this little thing is my savior. It is quiet, lightweight and small/discreet. I usually only use the low speed but sometimes have to crank it up. I took off one star because it arrived broken but I simply glued the front face piece back on with super glue and no problem. It’s a great price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: neafer

customer_reviews.title: It's the "IN YOUR FACE" personal fan...!
customer_reviews.text: The lowest fan speed produces very little airflow that you can't feel it, the highest fan speed produces a lot of noise that you can't do anything while the fan is running. The base of the fan is tiny so it can be bumped very easily, and the entire unit is made out of very fragile plastic which doesn't help either! NOT WORTH THE MONEY! Find a REAL fan instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than a similarly sized 110 v fan
customer_reviews.text: I have a Surface Book 2 which runs hot. The CPU is behind the screen and is fan less. I bought this to sit behind and keep the CPU cooler. It works well and on either low or medium very quiet. On high it can be a bit noisy. I was quite surprised by how much air it moves. I bought a 110v similarly sized fan because I was doubtful that a USB fan would be sufficient. I have to say, this little guy is as good or better than the house current one. I am curious how long it will last, but its been running about 12 hours a day for a couple of weeks and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: This fan has made me an OPOLAR believer
customer_reviews.text: It all began with this mighty mini fan, and it was so effective I began looking into their other products. In my search I found perhaps every desk fan I would ever need, so I bought two of their metal cage fans and two handheld fans, but then it got better. I apologize for the upcoming caps, but if you're skimming reviews and read only one line or so from each, then let it be this: OPOLAR MAKES A RECHARGEABLE HANDHELD AIR DUSTER TO BLOW DUST OUT OF ELECTRONICS It replaces those pesky $8-12 cans that are awful for the environment, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kiris

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shutting off
customer_reviews.text: The fan keeps shutting off. It will run a few seconds or minutes then shut off. Other times, it will run for an extended time. I have it plugged into a wall charger adapter as we are not allowed to plug USB devices into our computers at work. That adapter works fine for charging my cell so I know it works. Very frustrating to have to continually turn it on. It works great otherwise and quietly moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan of this fan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one for my kitchen table. My seat gets little airflow and went it’s super hot I feel like I’m melting. This little fan, on level one, is just perfect for keeping me comfortable. I bought a second one for my office (in a trailer) on these hot days when the window ac unit just isn’t keeping up with the airflow. Again I’m just on level one. Noise level on one pretty quiet. Level three is definitely noticeable but I’ve only used that level when I’m doing something more physical (like mopping the floor) and the airflow had a higher priority level than the noise!! I would definitely recommend this small but powerful fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for about 5 or 6 hour then lousy
customer_reviews.text: Well I read all the reviews and now I see what's happening I installed this fan and worked well about 5 hours sure enough it's slowed down like the motor gets overheated and can handle it I connected a second one I bought and it blows very well these are not very good fan they will be great for about 5 hours and will ultimately slow down not happy don't understand why all these reviews are so positive
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, lots of air for a USB-powered fan, but note...
customer_reviews.text: I like this little fan a lot and would highly recommend it but it should be noted that the on/off/level "switch" is a flat/flush button on the back of the fan head. If power goes out, the unit does NOT automatically come back on when power is restored, it must be manually turned back on. Had I known this, I probably would not have purchased it as we're using it to circulate air in our stored camper -- not like it's sitting on my desk at home or work.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: If you have any doubts, don’t....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fan and absolutely love it. I got the black and blue one. It’s cute, VERY quiet, & puts out a lot of air! It is perfect to throw in my bag to take with me to work. 3 speeds and can adjust direction easily from face to body. I’m dealing with hot flashes and this has been perfect. It’s super quiet even on the highest speed. It doesn’t make me want to fall asleep either.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndikins

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about this little mighty fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I now have one of these at home at and we have 3 at work in our Pharmacy (at each workstation). They are so powerful and still quiet. I sleep with on on me when I'm hot and it doesn't bother me husband. At work we all stay comfortable and everyone is just in awe of this little powerhouse! It produces the perfect amount of air to keep you cool but not be obnoxious or affect others. 3 speeds but I only use the lowest most of the time. It's strong enough!
customer_reviews.author: GenesBee

customer_reviews.title: THe little fan that could.  This thing is good.
customer_reviews.text: I NEED MY FAN WHEN I SLEEP! I dont know about you, but I have to take one with me when I travel. I have gone through a bunch of them over the years and have gotten very picky. This particular model I was nervous about. I had another model form them at lasted 2 years. When I got it, I was worried. It was smaller then my last one. Then I turned it on. This is by far the strongest USB fan I have used. The other fans Id have to keep on the high setting, this one I cannot go past the lowest setting. Trust me. coming from one who needs one! Get this little power house!
customer_reviews.author: Vaporjoes LLC

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: This small fan does an incredible job blowing air. The fan has a small tilt radius that works to bow air throughout the room in the upper part of the room or can be tilted upright to blow directy on you. I have a small office and it has made the hot summer days bearable. I also use one in my bedroom and one more to help push the air conditioner vented air into the living room. The only dislike is that if the power goes out, it needs to be manually turned back on as the power switch is a push button. Other than that, very glad I purchased three of them!
customer_reviews.author: G.Honey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended desktop solution
customer_reviews.text: This little guy moves a surprising amount of air, even on the lowest settings. On the highest setting, it would satisfy a polar bear. Although admittedly, it is the loudest thing in my office. On the lower settings, its audible but not bothersome- a gentle hum. Feels durable and solid, not what I was expecting for the price tag. I might buy another for my office, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Scott Sample

customer_reviews.title: Windy
customer_reviews.text: This fan is mighty in a small size. I bought it because I recently moved into a house where the ceiling is so low in the bedroom that a ceiling fan would be a danger. I'm allergic to all the pollen floating around this time of year so window opening isn't for me. This fan blows a breeze on its lowest setting. You can hardly hear it on the first setting but it gets a little louder as you go up the 3 speeds. Three speeds on a fan that Is very small. When I opened the box I thought wow a piece of junk but I was wrong. This fan is great.
customer_reviews.author: 2bees

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I looooove this little fan. I was in the woods for 2 weeks in a tiny tent, with 3 degree weather. This little fan stop me from feeling like I was melting in tent. I ran it off a small battery back for my cell phone. I actually had bought two hanging fan/light that was suppose to be so great, this tiny fan beat both of those fans out. It actually has some power to be so little. I am never camping without it
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, good quality
customer_reviews.text: For a plastic fan at this price, it's surprisingly well constructed. It's small size means that most people will be using it very close to them, and at that distance it's very quiet and puts out a lot of air. I have never needed to turn it up beyond the lowest setting and wish there were two that were lower instead of higher, but that is my only criticism. I bought one for my desk originally, but found myself taking it out to the living room to use there as well. My wife has seen how good they are, and so now I'm ordering two more.
customer_reviews.author: R ANTHONY KOLSTEE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fan, great seller, 5 star transaction!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but it only works on 2 modes ... what seems to be low if plugged into a 1 amp or higher and medium if plugged into my 2.1 amp wall adaptor. Product states different but they assure me this is normal ...??? ***Update: I've been sent a new fan, within a matter of 2 days (from the company) upon finding out about the 2 speeds - This new fan is amazing, it works on all 3 settings plugged into a 1amp adapter and works very well, pushes a strong current, but super quiet, lightweight but well made, only 40° rotation but gets a 5 star along with seller! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: BadN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Desk Fan
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and my home office isn't the coolest room in the house. I use this fan instead of cooling down the entire house just to drop my office down a couple degrees. It keeps me perfectly cool and it's quiet enough that it doesn't bother me while working. It is loud enough to be disruptive during phone calls though. Considering it's a fan, I think the noise level is acceptable. I'd definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It does more than I thought it would. The breeze is amazing! I use this mostly on the first level because that is sufficient to keep me cool. I have used level three which feels like a major wind storm when I have been exceptionally hot from working outside. I bought two of these. One for my office and one for home. I hope they last a long time. I have had mine for about two months and they are working fine. I would definitely recommend this fan to anyone looking to stay cool in this hot summer we have been having.
customer_reviews.author: Toppro

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit Approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the rabbit, seeing as how he destroyed any other thing I’ve gotten to try to help him keep cool in an un-air-conditioned California heatwave. Honestly, I didn’t know how he’d react to it. Would the noise scare him? Would it bother his ears? Would it look at him funny and incur his wrath? Turns out, it’s quiet enough and just the right amount of breeze for a very ungrateful rabbit. Does he actually like it? Who knows. Dude has the rabbit version of resting B face. Either way, I like it too and ordered a second one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite purchase of the year so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tiny whisper machine packs quite the punch! Even on the lowest setting, this machine creates enough of a breeze to cool down my desk in a matter of five minutes. My whole office (while admittedly quite small) is cooled down in less than a half hour, again, on the lowest setting!! While this will always need to be plugged in (and therefore cannot be moved around in use) the USB power cord makes it work virtually everywhere you have a source of power (including a power bank!) I 100% would recommend this little magic breeze device.
customer_reviews.author: hnix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for failing fan motor on old laptop
customer_reviews.text: Have a very old laptop that still performs beautifully after replacing the drive, but the fan motor doesn't cool the machine properly anymore, and it shuts itself off when it thinks it is overheating. Was using a regular pivoting household fan perched in a precarious position, which worked, but this little fan is such an improvement, and it does its job beautifully, even on the lowest of the three power settings. It's small footprint on a very crowded desk that holds three computers is also a big plus. Super quiet too. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: JHD

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan after the air in my car died. It’s going to cost me $1,600 to get it fixed so I’m the mean time, I thought this would work. It does. Keep it out of sunlight when not in use. When driving, I put it in the clip thing where my phone usually attaches to. It stays stable and gives off a decent amount of air flow. Just saying it again, keep it away from direct sunlight, that will make it blow hot air. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Really great fan but won't survive the smallest drop
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all really. It fell from the end table to the floor and it broke into several pieces including a fan blade breaking off in 3 pieces. Was a pretty great fan up until then. Would have been nice to have been able to do more then just sit it on the table, like clip it to your monitor/laptop.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Little Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Do not hesitate! When I took it out of the box, I was a little disappointed at how small it was, but got it plugged in and couldn’t be more pleased!! I didn’t realize it had speeds until I went to turn it off. The lowest speed is plenty. I use it in our sunroom where we just have a window unit and our summer temps are close to 100 all summer. I keep either moving it farther away or turning it off it cools me off so well! I rarely write reviews, but had to do one for this terrific little fan. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: lovescotties

customer_reviews.title: I am now a fan of this fan
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this fan. I like its size -small. I like its strength -powerful. I like the fact that it has three settings and gives a strong breeze on even its lowest setting. As fans go, it is quiet. There is some noise but very little. I get overheated easy. I love cold weather and hate hot weather. I sleep with 3 fans blowing on me at night and in the winter time I sleep with the window open. I keep my home at 69 degrees at all times. I would keep it lower but my AC guy said not to. So when I say this fan does the job - believe me - it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these, one for myself and my husband. Our AC sucks and we are trying to find a place to put in a new one. In the meantime the temp in the house gets to 82+ degrees in some rooms, it is horrible! I got this and have it plugged into my PC and it is quite a little powerhouse. the room is 80.7 and I am actually comfortable with the fan turned on medium. I was pleasantly surprised at the amazing airflow of the fan on high!. If you are looking for a small powerful fan that makes little noise this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy PerryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great value, powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the airflow from this fan at this price point. I have it plugged into one of the USB ports on the side of my monitor at work, and it takes up very little space on my desk. It is very quiet on all 3 speeds (nearly silent on low). The entire fan is made of plastic, so it is lightweight and easy to travel with. I've now ordered a second one for my desk at home. *One thing to note, I did try this in a USB 3.0 port, and it seems to spin the fan even faster (and louder), which I'm not sure this is meant for as it may wear out the motor quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan, but be aware...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan, but, be aware that you will need a USB to wall outlet (AC) converter in order to plug it into the wall, even with a USB/AC DC converter, it would not work with a standard remote control conversion. I use them all the time, especially because I'm paralyzed. While they do not have the ability to change settings, they will turn things off and on. In this case, it would only turn it off. if you no concerns about that, then you will probably love this fan.
customer_reviews.author: NICK DANGER

customer_reviews.title: Great for drying nails
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to quickly dry my nail polish and could find no manicure fan for normal nail polish. Then I viewed this fan and a previous reviewer said she used it it dry her nails. So I ordered the 4” fan. It works great, has 3 speeds (I use the fastest) and does exactly what I want it for. It has a plug for a USB port, but that was no problem for me. I think this little fan would work well hooked up to a computer to create cool air flow at a work space. It’s quiet and doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie1949

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly powerful & small fan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, powerful, little fan! I can't believe how strong it is, I usually just keep it on the 1st & lowest setting because the highest will freeze you out! I take it with me every day to work. It's very small so it's easy to throw in my bag. It has an attached wire that plugs into any USB. It's pretty durable too, I've dropped it countless times and it still works like new. I'm really impressed and very pleased with how well it works. Great option and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L Parada

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is fantastic for work! I wear a mask at my desk and put it between my monitors and it kept my fave cool all day. My colleagues all want one! Lol I also use it at home while using my laptop. My daughter loved it so much I ordered her one that will be arriving soon. A great item for $11!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mickletz

customer_reviews.title: Ok fan
customer_reviews.text: Its a good fan overall but would prefer lower speed settings. There was some RF interference when located near TV whereas another type of Opolar fan did not give issues. In general it is an ok fan , not so convinced all Usb power packs will allow a current drain for this fan. Often times a over current draw will shut down power pack unit after a short period. So something else to investigate when purchasing a portable power supply when looking to run something what is current output.
customer_reviews.author: camp david

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thing about this fan is that it’s lightweight and small. But the noise is extremely disturbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected this fan to be weak and have the whole ' mass produced from China' level of quality. Completely blown away with how professional this fan is in quality and function. Main points: - Extremely powerful with 3 well differentiated settings. - Cord is well constructed and fits precisely in the unit, so no issues with it getting loose over time of failing due to weak connectors. - Very polished plastic housing with a clean aesthetic and smooth pieces. I'm just using this fan for quick air drying of items on my desk, which it performs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Objective

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fan for work, and let me tell you, this thing is POWERFUL I love it so much, I’ve even started using it at the house! It’s so convenient to have the usb cord and no bulky plug! Great for desk tops and truly does the job! I would for sure buy another one just for home use! The cord is pretty long which gives access for putting it in many spots. It’s not loud at all, and I can walk pretty far away from this little fan and still feel a breeze! Its 100% worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: What A Powerful Little Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan totally "blew me away" (pardon the pun!) It packs a great low and then medium but high was serious air movement! I may buy 4 or 5 more of these for the summer and assist my AC in cooling some dead zones of AC. I especially love the USB connection for power since all my power supplies have USB ports on them and this fan works around the clock. No batteries and not taking a socket for electric. Also a shout out to the seller they are sweet and caring and I always appreciate a happy seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight fan that makes a horrible high pitched noise which I cannot sleep to.
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn’t bought this to use while sleeping it would be a great fan. I’m keeping it to use in the summer, as for its size and weight it moves an impressive amount of air. Unfortunately it also produces a high-pitched tone when running that I can’t sleep to, which was what I’d bought it for. So if you’re planning on doing the same, get another fan. If you’re just wanting to use it during the day with other noises around you, however, it’s a great fan for its size, weight and cost.
customer_reviews.author: ThoughtsAboutMyStuff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little fan, and perfect for a desk.
customer_reviews.text: I already own two OPolar fans and love them to bits, but I ordered this one for work as it can get stuffy in my office. It's absolutely amazing. It's almost completely silent which is great because there are always people in and out of my office and having meetings so this won't disturb or bother them at all. It gives off a lovely cool breeze and is really quite powerful. OPolar does it again! Don't hesitate...I absolutely love this brand. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rockgurl

customer_reviews.title: Great fan with 3 speeds: Fast, Faster, and Hurricane!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my kids to use while they are doing work on their computers. This fan has 3 speeds and moves air really well. The slowest speed was adequate when it was 90 °F. My son pointed out that the speeds should be labeled as Fast, Faster, and Hurricane. At the fastest speed the fan will turn your face inside-out. It is loudest at the fastest speed, but it is just a minor hum. This also works with a portable battery charger with a USB port. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these!! I purchased the original one for my office desk in which my back was to a south-facing window which got quite hot in the afternoon. This fan, used daily, helped me keep cool under tough circumstances. I recently purchased a 2nd one to use in my garage, to cool some hardware I have set up here in the desert. It works beautifully and because it's so small, it has a low energy footprint as well. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a mini fan but is very powerful I use it every night and doing the day when riding my exercise bike I only have to use the low setting which is very cold its amazing how such a little thing can give out so much cold air and it's not even loud even on the high setting thanks Amazon anyone looking for a fan that doesn't take up a lot of space quite while sleeping and very cold air this is it my husband said he can even fill it on him from my bedside table WOW !!! amazing
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi  Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paired with a power bank. Very Powerful has three settings!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have MS so I stay very hot during the day. I looked for a few weeks for a fan solution to take on the go with me. What I found was this life saver!! I mean it!!! I now use this everywhere I go with a 10,000 MAH power bank (not that I need one that size as it uses such little power its crazy.) I have used this fan daily for about eight hours each day for over a week on my 10,000 MAH power bank, which has only lost one bar of power out of four. That's crazy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful mini fan. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mini fan for my office. I was surprised how powerful the little fan was even on the lowest setting. On those hot days where the a/c isn’t working I stay cool with this fan. Love it. Going to get some as gift for birthdays and holidays for coworkers and friends. Great buy. Works great. Easy to use. Powerful
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best cheapest mighty powerful small fan ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son to have something small to cool him down on hot days when doing his zoom online learning classes because of schools still closed down for in class learning due to covid19, this fan packs a powerful airflow and connects to his chromebook or his iPad USB charger box. He is so happy I bought this because of the heat wave right now here in Central Cali with no AC in our house. I might have to buy a few more for my other 2 teenagers. Great product for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: romncequeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fan
customer_reviews.text: I should take some pictures. I just received it today. At this time I like it. At a pure guess the cord appears to be 4 foot long or so. The "basket" around the blade is about 5 inches (12.5 mm) at it's widest point. The small stand doesn't have a lot of tilt to it, but enough for a desk fan, in my opinion. The entire unit stands about 6.5 inches tall. Plugs into a USB port and has a single button on the back of the unit. 3 speed options. It is rather quiet and puts out a decent amount of air. I like that little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Valkem

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks in the photo
customer_reviews.text: The actual fan is tiny, it's much smaller than it appeared in the photo. However, it produces a TON of air!! I love it! I use the lowest speed, and it works great, and it has 2 higher speeds that are even stronger. A surprising amount of power from a little fan. It was pretty expensive for a tiny office fan, but it does the job that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pace

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I brought this not for me but to use as a ventilation for my WiFi modem. I've been using the mini fan for a month and for such a little fan it sure is strong, my WiFi modem does work better since I've been using it and you will notice the noise in a quiet room but it's not overbearing or annoying. At low speed settings you get a nice breeze and I know if I was using this for my needs I would be happy. Only thing make sure you clean it as it does get dusty (it's easy and takes 5 minutes) and the fan needs a usb plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome power for such a small fan
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive and very small fan for a desktop or similar application this one will check all the boxes. While the fan might appear much smaller than you would expect, the air that it pushes even at the lowest level is more than adequate for a quick cool down. The power cable has a very recent length, and with the fan being powered through USB it makes this quite portable. The front half of the fan grill is easily removable in order to clean the blades or inside whenever necessary. Overall this fan is a great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Blows Very Strong Air
customer_reviews.text: For a fan this size, it seems to blow pretty strongly. We use it to cool our laptop and the wind blows so strongly that our hands get cold. The only caveat for us is that we would have preferred that it rotate more downwards. 360 degrees rotation would have been nice. Otherwise, if you don't need it to rotate, then it's a great mini-fan. Feels a bit on the noisier side personally, but that could be preferences. Also, if it were clippable, instead of just a desk stand, would have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good!
customer_reviews.text: I cheaped out and bought a USB fan off of eBay to keep air circulating around some hard drives. I was going to order this fan but Amazon shipping was taking forever to deliver items like this due to COVID. Short story, the cheap fan only lasted a couple of months. I replaced it with this fan and it seems like a much better fan in every respect. Build quality, quietness, versatility. Moral of the story: Don't try to save a couple of bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Patton

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my boyfriend alive
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 30 and suffer from hot flashes. My boyfriend is cold blooded and uses a blanket in the summer. However, I run the AC during all seasons including the winter. In order to keep my boyfriend alive and not freezing to death, I use this small fan at my bedside to blow cold, refreshing air on my hot, flushed face. 10/10 would recommend to anyone with hormonal problems like myself.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Very strong for a small fan! Bought in case of power outages... Super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is really strong for a tiny fan! I was pleasantly surprised. It looked a bit cheap but when I turned it on I was impressed! I got it in case of power outages because it can work on usb and I know I’ll have some cooling still if the power is out.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly strong!
customer_reviews.text: For such a little fan, it gives a nice strong air flow! 3 speed settings controlled by a single button on the back, so you have to cycle through all the settings...low, medium, fast, off. Not a big deal. The sound on the high speed is a bit loud, but then again I have it sitting right next to me. I'm please at how it somehow manages to stay put where I set it, despite it's light weight. Overall really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Wacky Witch Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Why am I so hot
customer_reviews.text: I share an office with what I can can only assume are reptiles. So they get mad when I try to cool the space down. How am I the only one sweating my ass off? This product has made working better. I don’t know if it is an approved appliance by work but they can pry it from my cold dead hands. If I take off any more clothes to try to cool down I will be down to my bra and literally no one wants that. Better to be easy breezy.
customer_reviews.author: Not today

customer_reviews.title: Cool, quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan because of the great reviews and my positive experience with their 9 inch USB model. On low this fan produces an effective gentile breeze that's perfect for sitting at my desk. Medium is too powerful for my desk setting and high blew me away. This little thing really moves the air. Yes it's amazing, quiet and well designed. On high the fan uses about 820mah of power. So it should run for at least 10 hours hooked up to a 10,000mah powerbank.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Chaser

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I can truly say I love my little desk fan! Don’t let this small bad boy fool you. It has 3 settings and works like magic. I’m always running around at work and despite have two AC units I’m always hot :( this little baby here fixes the issue right away and all from the first setting! Love how small it is so it doesn’t take up much space in my desk area and let’s not forget the cute colors it has. I also really like how it doesn’t need to be plugged into an electrical outlet you have the option of that or a connection via USB. I totally recommend this fan :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful for such a small fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a whim. When I’m gaming or streaming my PC throws off a lot of heat and it gets stifling. Having some airflow across my face was greatly needed. This does surprisingly well keeping me cool even on the low setting. It is worth note that there are three speeds and the fan gets louder with the increased speed. I wouldn’t want to run a mic with the fan on med or high but on low I was in a call and no on noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Commander579

customer_reviews.title: The most powerful little fan in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing little fan. I didn't believe all the positive reviews but it's true. You get so much cooling from it. I I just love it and I'm going to get another! There are three speeds and even the lowest speed is powerful. It's also very convenient that it hooks into a USB outlet. It's much preferable to a clunky plug. Buy with confidence. The price is terrific and you'll be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: There's no battery but works beyond expectation
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaaay more powerful then I thought it it would be....prob best deskfan I ever bought (update!) Ok have this fan for a couple of weeks now....still sticking to my review awesome little thing only downfall is the wire is very fragile....mines slightly got pull out from a slight tug....use a little hot glue and that fix the issue....besides that for the price... guess I can't complain definitely out perform every deskfan I've come across going to be sticking to this brand for all my cooling needs in the future....just fix the description and I'll change to 5stars it's pretty misleading.
customer_reviews.author: GangstaWaffle

customer_reviews.title: Quiet little fan with a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I thought it was great when I first got it, it moved a pretty darn good amount of air for how tiny it was. Then I realized it has 3 settings. Oh. It can move a TON of air on the highest setting. I was extremely impressed! If I had to give it a possible downside, I'd say the fact it doesn't move, I guess, but I don't mind that at all. Awesome for the price and looks great on my computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: HOW can this tiny lightweight fan do this?!
customer_reviews.text: My expectations weren’t actually very high, but I need a desktop usb fan for my studio to draw cool air in from the window. This isn’t the artsiest design out, there but the reviews were great. When I turned it on I couldn’t believe how quiet it is! And I had forgotten it has 3 speeds, even on low it’s great! I just couldn’t be happier and more impressed by this little fan, very good value and I’m hoping it doesn’t break. You can register to extend your warranty to 18 mos so that’s reassuring. Trust me, this is the fan you want for your tiny space- car, desk, closet, etc, it’s quiet but it moves a lot of air!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: amazing power for a USB powered fan
customer_reviews.text: The amount of air this puts out is unbelievable considering it’s only 4 1/2 W of power. I use this in the summertime and I just used it on low at a good distance away or else it’s more air than I need. If you have it on high, it rivals room size small fans. it has excellent control, so airflow is very focused, doing a great job. I think other fans move more air but this can aim it right at you. This is an incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: Pch Enterprises IncTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful and very good for it's size. A great desk fan!
customer_reviews.text: My office's AC was broken for a week and I decided to buy this fan for my desk and it's been surprisingly very good! Especially for it's size and weight it can do a decent job of keeping you cool at your desk. I like that it has 3 fan speeds. No oscillating feature though. I would rate the noise level a medium; not totally silent but also not obtrusive enough to disturb you. Price is also very reasonable for it's performance. Overall, a great desk fan!
customer_reviews.author: D.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Small But Fierce!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desktop USB fan I have ever bought thus far!! There's a big difference between each speed, and the top speed is pretty powerful while still keeping a quiet noise that wouldn't be disruptive (I bought two for our clinic office where we speak with patients all day). At the same time it provides a soothing white noise that is just loud enough. I've not had them too long, will update if any issues but no news is good news!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very Mighty Little Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at my new job. I suffer hot flashes and really need something to help when I'm in the midst of one. This is a mighty little fan! It has 3 speeds and the highest speed is quite powerful (and also quiet)! I hope it lasts for a long time. Thank you for a smooth transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little fan!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan has 3 rates of speed (just keep hitting the button on the back of the fan to increase speed). It packs a surprising wallop for such a little thing! It does have a USB plug not an electrical plug so be aware of that. Would be great to plug into computer to help keep you cool. I just used one of those white bricks from apple and then plugged it into the wall. It's great! Super quiet and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW: Very Quiet & Super Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I just HAD to update my review! I absolutely hate fans clogged w/dust. It’s bad for allergies, the engine, the bearings etc & it causes the fan to make noises by making it off balance. I’m completely thrilled with how easy it was to remove the faceplate & clean it! Genius! Yay! So very pleased. I will be investing more in more in these awesome little fans. Woohoo! Quiet, three speeds, good cord length. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a great product for the money. It has 3 speeds and fits compactly on your desk. keeps me cool when the office is too hot. Plugs easily into the USB port of your computer. All in all I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY NOVOTNY

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, everything just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great little usb fan! Working in a hot office with 4 other folks at a meeting table. We needed something small, lightweight, portable, quiet (5 fans running) that worked. This was it! 3 speeds all not particularly noisy. Lowest speed is whisper quiet. The fan adjusts up or down. The best part was that it doesn’t “walk” across the desk as it runs because it doesn’t vibrate. Love it, best purchase and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Collard

customer_reviews.title: Extra cooling extends CPU life quietly.
customer_reviews.text: Heat build up can damage and short the life of all electronic devices. This little fans dissipates the heat and keeps my electronics cool and is very quiet at low speed. I Ieave my laptop running all the time and being in a bedroom cabinet it can get a little warm, some times too warm. This little USB fan keeps it cool, at low speed and I don't ever hear it. Best and most useful PC gadget I have purchased yet. For the price will save you lots of money compared to replacing a cooked CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office with no middle mark, it’s either an icebox or it’s a sauna, and it can vary on the hour let alone the day.. I decided to order this fan based on other reviews and I’m glad I did! The rubber feet make this fan very stable even on a standing desk, and when it’s on low I don’t even hear it at all! It does have a bit of noise at the highest level but I don’t see myself using it on high with how powerful it is on low or medium speed. I do wish the button was either in the front or on the base Itself, but I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: James Hampsten

customer_reviews.title: Incredible little desk fan for the price!  VERY strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have two mid-tier gaming PCs in a medium-small room and it gets WARM when my girlfriend and I are both playing. She would wear a jacket in a volcano, but I'd sweat in a freezer. I pickup up this guy to stay comfortable in there, and the lowest setting accomplishes that with EASE. It's extremely strong and low and not very loud considering the air it moves. The middle and high settings are noticeably louder, but they're so strong they'll blow you away, so it's understandable. I only ever run it on low. For the price, it would be hard to do better than this for a desktop fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner S.

customer_reviews.title: Stops randomly sometimes, but great otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is perfect for my desk! It's a powerful little sucker, even on the lowest level! My only gripe is that sometimes it'll cut out and stop for no reason, though it'll click back on with no problem when I press the button again. (EDIT Oct 16, 2020: Turns out that issue was because of the power strip, not the fan!) The cord is generous enough to reach the power strip under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a powerful little fan, I absolutely love it! I already have several battery operated fans by OPOLAR and they are great quality so when I needed to replace a small side fan I immedately thought of OPOLAR. I am glad I did because this fan does not disappoint. Its everything I wanted - small/compact, very quiet, 3 speeds, decent cord length and inexpensive. Zero complaints. Ive already ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharin Payne

customer_reviews.title: I buy a lot of little fans, and this one is easily the BEST
customer_reviews.text: First, I buy a ton of fans. I get hot so easily and must have air hitting my face at all times. I have little metal fans, little USB-C fans (attaches to my phone), etc...and this fan blows all of them away. The fact that it has three speeds alone is awesome. I do wish I didn't have to cycle through all the speed modes just to turn it off though. A separate on/off button would be nice (hint hint).
customer_reviews.author: Erich Cervantez

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in to multiple USB outlets and it would not turn on. Returning has been a hassle. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great value
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is awesome! I take public transit to work and walk a portion of that, so as the weather warms up, sometimes I'm a little too warm when I get to my desk. This fan is the perfect solution. It angles a reasonable amount and even the lowest speed is enough for me. It's super quiet - I don't even notice over the normal background office noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Tiny but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: The name does it justice. It IS tiny, but mighty. I have it on my desk and it's PERFECT. It's not noisy like some of these small ones get. The fact that it's THREE different speeds is amazing. I keep it on low when I'm just sitting and writing, but when I move further away, I can turn it up to 3 and it'll still blow pretty cool air to me. I have absolutely no issues with it. It's definitely worth your money if you're looking for a small fan for your table to keep you cool.
customer_reviews.author: Evan A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan
customer_reviews.text: Very strong little fan, perfect for my desk. The lowest setting is almost always enough for me. I only use higher settings when I just came in from the outside and I was sweating. The noise is hardly noticeable on the low setting - all coworkers I've asked claimed they couldn’t hear it even though they sit next to me. High setting is a little loud to be sitting right next to, but that’s about it
customer_reviews.author: EstebanXIV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power and price!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is amazing! The strength of the fan is incredible. The value! For something this small and powerful the price is incredible!!! I’m buying another one for my office desk. This one I have at the end of my hospital bed. Because of medications I get hot and cannot sleep. Last night I used the fan for the first time and slept like a baby! I didn’t think when I opened the package and saw how small it was that it was going to of any use or value but I was wrong! I can’t recommend this enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Although this fan is only of the 4" kind it puts out great breezes, and since it has three speeds the range of breezes it delivers is amazing for the price. I really like that the face cover can be removed to clean the blades, which inevitably get covered with humidity-based dust that gunks up the leading edge of the blade causing the blades to produce a noticeably diminished breeze. I like this one much better than the 4" all-metal one-speed fans on eBay, of which I've had five, and three of them died within six months.
customer_reviews.author: lark

customer_reviews.title: Small and works well
customer_reviews.text: Small but right size for on the go or one person office desk, have 3 level of speed, fairly quite except you are on call :). Other will complain about hissing noise. USB based so easy to plug in different sources including battery pack. I have it for some time use it for my office desk, it is small only for one person, if you have more than one person it will not be suitable. Hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir

product_meta.title: OPOLAR USB Desk Fan, Small but Mighty, Quiet Portable Fan for Desktop Office Table, 40° Adjustment for Better Cooling, 3 Speeds, 4.9 ft Cord
feature_bullets: 🌌【Small but mighty】Compared with the old version USB metal fan, this fan pushes packs a huge punch and cools you down quickly.Don't look it down because of its small appearance. You will surprise by how super strong the airflow is.
🤫【Quiet Operation】Although the fan is very strong, even in high speed the noise is less than 50dB. It is a quiet and good friend when working and sleeping. Ideal for your desk, office bedroom Use.

💲【USB Powered】 Powered by a 4.9ft USB cable, compatible with computers, laptops, power banks, wall chargers and any other USB-enabled power supply. USB fan is energy-saving and environmentally friendly.
💧【Adjustable & Easy to Clean】 Fan head is able to tilt from 0 to 40 degree to direct the airflow to where you want. Removable front cover is easy to remove for cleaning the fan blade.
👍【Life Saver on Hot Summer】Save you from hot flashes. This summer will be more pleasant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,915 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
